Package com.alberto.networkmap

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildConfig  
    Config
    This class contains the configuration values for the network map
    MySQLiteOpenHelper
    This class takes care of opening the database if it exists, creating it if it does not, and upgrading it as necessary
    MySQLiteOpenHelper.table_bandwidth_map
    This class contains the name of each field that compound the bandwidth_map
    MySQLiteOpenHelper.table_paths_bandwidth_map
    This class contains the name of each field that compound the paths_bandwidth_map
    NetworkMap
    This class defines the interface to access the data in the Network Map.
    NetworkMapDataAlignment
    This class acts as a Service which is listening for Intents with the data of a network performance sample and processes this data to obtain a new network performance measurement which is properly stored in the network map
    NetworkMapDataSource
    This class managed the operations with the Database where the network performance map is stored
    NetworkMapPathAlignment
    This class acts as a Service which is listening for Intents with the data of a transition defined by a start location and a end location.
    NetworkMonitor
    This class implements the methods to take data which are used to determine the network performance
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    UTMLocation
    This class represent a Location defined by UTM coordinates and implements the methods necessary to handle this locations
Author:
Alberto
